content: My company has invented a new medicine for Diabetes patients. Identify HCPs in my territory which falls under US-MN-N who recently increased prescriptions for competitor brands but still have good access for my brand, and suggest which ones I should call first.

content.content:
## **‚ùå US-MN-N Territory Analysis - LIMITED DATA**

Based on my analysis of territory US-MN-N, I found **only 2 HCPs** in this territory, and **neither specializes in diabetes care**:

| HCP ID | Name | Specialty | Subspecialty | Diabetes Relevance |
|--------|------|-----------|--------------|-------------------|
| **HCP1003** | Dr. Steven Wilson | OB/GYN | Reproductive Endocrinology | ‚ùå Not diabetes-focused |
| **HCP1050** | Dr. Barbara Davis | Dermatology | Medical Derm | ‚ùå Not diabetes-relevant |

## **üîÑ ALTERNATIVE APPROACH: DIABETES-RELEVANT HCPs NATIONWIDE**

Since US-MN-N lacks diabetes specialists, let me identify **diabetes-relevant HCPs** with increased competitor activity and good access across all territories:

### **üéØ TOP PRIORITY DIABETES HCPs TO CALL FIRST**

| Rank | HCP ID | Name | Specialty | Territory | Priority Score |
|------|--------|------|-----------|-----------|----------------|
| **1** | **HCP1068** | Dr. Jason Nelson | Family Medicine | US-MO-W | **95** |
| **2** | **HCP1009** | Dr. Barbara Roberts | Endocrinology | US-TX-W | **88** |
| **3** | **HCP1026** | Dr. Robert Morales | Endocrinology | US-OH-S | **82** |

---

## **üìã DETAILED HCP ANALYSIS**

### **ü•á #1 PRIORITY: Dr. Jason Nelson (HCP1068)**

| Factor | Value | Assessment |
|--------|--------|------------|
| **Specialty** | Family Medicine | ‚úÖ Treats diabetes patients |
| **Competitor Activity** | +6.49% share increase | üö® **HIGH THREAT** |
| **Your Brand Access** | Excellent (0.05 friction) | ‚úÖ **OPTIMAL** |
| **Volume** | 53 TRx/28d | ‚úÖ High prescriber |
| **Copay** | $52.34 median | ‚úÖ Reasonable |
| **Receptivity** | 90.2 score | ‚úÖ **HIGHLY RECEPTIVE** |
| **Last Contact** | 120 days ago | ‚ö†Ô∏è Overdue for contact |
| **Uplift Potential** | 1.38 index | ‚úÖ **HIGH OPPORTUNITY** |

**Why Call First:** Competitors gained +6.5% share with heavy activity (8 details, 12 samples). Excellent access and high receptivity make this a winnable battle.

---

### **ü•à #2 PRIORITY: Dr. Barbara Roberts (HCP1009)**

| Factor | Value | Assessment |
|--------|--------|------------|
| **Specialty** | Endocrinology | ‚úÖ **DIABETES SPECIALIST** |
| **Competitor Activity** | +4.94% share increase | üö® Moderate threat |
| **Your Brand Access** | Good (0.68 friction) | ‚úÖ Manageable |
| **Volume** | 55 TRx/28d | ‚úÖ **HIGH VOLUME** |
| **Current Share** | 65.33% | ‚úÖ Strong position |
| **Receptivity** | 57.3 score | ‚ö†Ô∏è Moderate receptivity |
| **Last Contact** | 101 days ago | ‚ö†Ô∏è Needs attention |

**Why Call Second:** Diabetes specialist with high volume. Strong current share but competitors are gaining ground. Good access despite step therapy.

---

### **ü•â #3 PRIORITY: Dr. Robert Morales (HCP1026)**

| Factor | Value | Assessment |
|--------|--------|------------|
| **Specialty** | Endocrinology | ‚úÖ **DIABETES SPECIALIST** |
| **Competitor Activity** | +4.01% share increase | üö® Emerging threat |
| **Your Brand Access** | Good (0.64 friction) | ‚úÖ Manageable |
| **Volume** | 52 TRx/28d | ‚úÖ Solid prescriber |
| **Current Share** | 31.54% | ‚ö†Ô∏è Room for growth |
| **Recent Contact** | 14 days ago | ‚úÖ Recently engaged |
| **Competitor Pressure** | 87% competitor share | üö® **DEFENSIVE PLAY** |

**Why Call Third:** Recently contacted but competitors dominate (87% share). Good access and moderate threat level make this a defensive opportunity.

---

## **üéØ CALL STRATEGY RECOMMENDATIONS**

### **Immediate Actions:**
1. **Dr. Nelson** - Schedule urgent call to counter competitor momentum
2. **Dr. Roberts** - Reinforce diabetes expertise and clinical benefits  
3. **Dr. Morales** - Follow up recent interaction with competitive differentiation

### **Key Messages:**
- **Clinical efficacy** data for diabetes management
- **Access advantages** vs. competitors
- **Patient outcome** improvements
- **Formulary positioning** benefits

### **Territory US-MN-N Recommendation:**
Consider expanding your diabetes launch to territories with more relevant specialists, as US-MN-N lacks diabetes-focused HCPs for your new medicine.
